page.title: 03SCHOOL MEALS
page.content:
COST OF MEAL =0.45pence DEPENDING ON FAMILY INCOME SOME CHILDREN QUALIFY FOR FREE SCHOOL MEALS THESE CHILDREN ARE ALSO SUBSIDISED FOR ORGANISED SCHOOL TRIPS UPTO Â£3 IN ONE SCHOOL YEAR.THE MENU CHANGES EACH WEEK {MONDAY NEW POTATOES FISH FINGERS PEAS { SPONGE AND CUSTARD
{TUESDAY BEEF POTATOES CARROTS { APPLE PIE & CUSTARD
{WEDNESDAY SHEPHERDS PIE CABBAGE} {RICE PUDDING { {THURSDAY SALAD CHEESE PIE CUSTARD
{FRIDAY BEEFBURGERS CHIPS BAKED BEANS ICE-CREAM THERE IS USUALLY A CHOICE OF A SALAD INSTEAD OF A COOKED MEAL.
